p: 1-((1H-1,2,4-triazol-1-yl)methyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (50). Purification by flash column chromatography using methanol/dichloromethane (1:99) with 0.01% formic acid afforded the pure product as a white solid in 53% yield. 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.49 (s, 1H), 7.95 (s, 1H), 7.46 − 7.21 (m, 5H), 4.80 (d, J = 14.7 Hz, 1H), 3.48 (d, J = 14.7 Hz, 1H), 3.19 (t, J = 8.3 Hz, 1H), 1.92 (dd, J = 10.6, 5.3 Hz, 2H). 13C NMR (101 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 176.0, 149.6, 143.9, 134.8, 128.9, 128.6, 127.5, 49.2, 32.9, 30.1, 17.4. HRMS (ESI): calculated for C 13H 12O 2N 3 [M-H] 242.09240 found 242.09300.
